name: PicoFlap
description:
Needed something to fill some time so I decided on attempting to make a faithful flappy bird clone on pico-8.

Avoid the pipes and flap using the Z key on keyboard (the O dpad key for pico-8), be sure to make use of falling and intermittent flaps when trying to alter height.

I may break this down into a little tutorial if any pico newbies want to try their hand at it.  It was fun to make..

Sprites were copied by hand; this is by no means endorsed by the the original makers of Flappy Bird, theres also a configurable "tolerance" level that I've set quite high so the pipe hit boxes arent as harsh as they appear..

My top score was 60.
